00060 struct DEIoptions {
00061   float  Rm;            
00062   float  Rp;            
00063   float  Gm;            
00064   float  Gp;            
00065 
00066   DEIoptions() : Rm(0.5), Rp(0.5), Gm(1.0), Gp(-1.0) {}; 
00067 
00072   poptmx::OptionTable options() {
00073     poptmx::OptionTable opt("DEI input parameters.",
00074                             "Options required for the DEI processing.");
00075     opt
00076       .add(poptmx::OPTION, &Rm,'m', "minus-rc",
00077            "Reflectivity in the minus position.", "", toString(Rm))
00078       .add(poptmx::OPTION, &Rp,'p', "plus-rc",
00079            "Reflectivity in the plus position.", "", toString(Rp))
00080       .add(poptmx::OPTION, &Gm,'M', "minus-drv",
00081            "Derivative of the RC in the minus position.", "", toString(Gm))
00082       .add(poptmx::OPTION, &Gp,'P', "plus-drv",
00083            "Derivative of the RC in the plus position.", "", toString(Gp));
00084     return opt;
00085   };
00086 
00087 };

00094 class DEI_API DEIprocess{
00095 
00096 private:
00097 
00098   static const std::string modname;     
00099   const float  Rm;            
00100   const float  Rp;            
00101   const float  Gm;            
00102   const float  Gp;            
00103 
00104 public:
00105 
00107   typedef enum {
00108     ABS,                        
00109     REF                         
00110   }  Component ;
00111 
00112   static const std::string componentDesc; 
00113 
00114   DEIprocess(float _Gm=1.0, float _Gp=-1.0, float _Rm=0.5, float _Rp=0.5); 
00115 
00116   float extract(float minus, float plus, Component comp) const ;
00117 
00118   template<int N_rank> blitz::Array<float, N_rank>
00119     extract(const blitz::Array<float, N_rank> & minus,
00120              const blitz::Array<float, N_rank> & plus,
00121              Component comp) const;
00122 
00123 };
00124 
00128 inline std::string
00129 type_desc (DEIprocess::Component*){
00130   return "STRING";
00131 }
00132 
00139 inline bool
00140 _conversion (DEIprocess::Component* _val, const std::string & in) {
00141   std::string _in = upper(in);
00142   if (_in == "A" || _in == "ABS" || _in == "ABSORPTION" )
00143     *_val= DEIprocess::ABS;
00144   else if (_in == "R" || _in == "REF" || _in == "REFRACTION" )
00145     *_val= DEIprocess::REF;
00146   else
00147     throw_error("DEI component", "Unrecognized component\"" + _in + "\".");
00148   return true;
00149 }
00150 
00151 inline std::string
00152 toString(DEIprocess::Component comp) {
00153   switch (comp) {
00154   case DEIprocess::ABS : return "absorption";
00155   case DEIprocess::REF : return "refraction";
00156   default : throw_error("DEI component name", "Unknown component.");
00157   }
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 
00162 
00163 
00173 template<int N_rank> blitz::Array<float, N_rank>
00174 DEIprocess::extract (const blitz::Array<float, N_rank> & minus,
00175                      const blitz::Array<float, N_rank> & plus,
00176                      Component comp) const {
00177 
00178   if ( minus.shape() != plus.shape() )
00179     throw_error(modname, "Geometry of the minus and plus"
00180                 " arrays do not match." );
00181 
00182   blitz::Array<float, N_rank> out( minus.shape() );
00183   typename blitz::Array<float, N_rank>::iterator
00184     ocur = out.begin(), oend=out.end();
00185   typename blitz::Array<float, N_rank>::const_iterator
00186     pcur = plus.begin(), mcur = minus.begin();
00187 
00188   while (ocur != oend)
00189     *ocur++ = extract(*mcur++, *pcur++, comp);
00190 
00191   return out;
00192 }

00201 class DEIexp : public Experiment {
00202 
00203 private:
00204 
00205   static const std::string modname;  
00206   AqSeries Mlist;              
00207   AqSeries Plist;              
00208   DEIprocess proc;             
00209   DEIprocess::Component comp;  
00210 
00211 public:
00212 
00220   inline DEIexp(const DEIprocess & _proc, DEIprocess::Component _comp,
00221                 const AqSeries & _Mlist, const AqSeries & _Plist) :
00222     Experiment(_Mlist.shape(), _Mlist.thetas()),
00223     proc(_proc),
00224     Mlist(_Mlist),
00225     Plist(_Plist)
00226   {
00227     if ( Mlist.thetas() != Plist.thetas() )
00228       throw_error(modname, "Different sizes of the data aquired in minus and plus positions.");
00229     if ( Mlist.shape() != Plist.shape() )
00230       throw_error(modname, "Different shapes of the data aquired in minus and plus positions.");
00231     component(_comp);
00232   }
00233 
00234   inline void projection(int itheta, Map & proj,
00235                          const std::vector<int> & sliceV = std::vector<int>() ) const {
00236     Map prM(sh), prP(sh);
00237     Mlist.projection(itheta, prM, sliceV);
00238     Plist.projection(itheta, prP, sliceV);
00239     proj = proc.extract( prM, prP, comp);
00240   }
00241 
00246   inline void component(DEIprocess::Component _comp) {
00247     comp = _comp;
00248     cntr = ( comp == DEIprocess::ABS ) ? Contrast::ABS : Contrast::REF ;
00249   }
00250 
00251 };
00252 
00253 const std::string DEIexp::modname="DEI experiment";
